title: Myriad Pro themes for ggplot
code: p <- ggplot(mtcars,              aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +    geom_point() +    labs(x = "Weight", y = "Miles per Gallon",         title = "This is the title", subtitle = "This is the subtitle",         caption = "This is the caption")    p
